text: Bare-Fisted Gallagher is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:Bare-Fisted Gallagher 1919 silent western feature directed by Joseph J. Franz and starring William Desmond. It was produced by Jesse D Hampton and released through Robertson-Cole soon to amalgamate into Film Booking Offices of America (FBO). The AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993:Bare-Fisted GallagherBare-Fisted Gallagher at silentera.com ==Cast== *William Desmond - Bare-Fisted Gallagher *Agnes Vernon - Jem Mason *Arthur Millett - Selby Mason *Frank Lanning - Aliso Pete *Caroline Rankin - The Old Maid *Bill Patton - Driver #1 *Scotty MacGregor - Driver #2 *Tom Ashton - Mexican Boy(*uncredited) ==References== ==External links== * Bare-Fisted Gallagher at IMDb.com * *lantern slide Category:1919 films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American films Category:Films directed by Joseph Franz Category:Lost American films Category:Lost Western (genre) films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:1919 lost films Category:1919 Western (genre) films
title: Bare-Fisted Gallagher
